select t.* from ( SELECT (TO_DAYS(NOW()) <= TO_DAYS(m.actual_deadline ) and !m.is_force_end and !m.is_all_textbook_published)*cc.is_material_entry as sortByEntryBtnOn, (TO_DAYS(NOW()) <= TO_DAYS(m.actual_deadline ) and !m.is_force_end and !m.is_all_textbook_published) as notEnd, d.id as declaration_id, (case when d.online_progress REGEXP '^[520]{1}$' then 1 else 0 end )as dec_editable, m.deadline, cc.* FROM cms_content cc LEFT JOIN pmph_user pu ON cc.author_id =pu.id LEFT JOIN cms_category ccg ON cc.category_id = ccg.id LEFT JOIN material m ON m.id = cc.material_id
left join material_org mo on mo.material_id=m.id left join (select tu.*,wuc.progress from writer_user tu LEFT JOIN writer_user_certification wuc on tu.id = wuc.user_id where tu.id = #{id}) wu on wu.id= #{id} and wu.org_id=mo.org_id
left join declaration d on d.user_id = #{id} and d.material_id=cc.material_id WHERE cc.is_deleted = 0 AND cc.category_id=3 AND cc.auth_status =2 AND cc.apporpc!=2
AND cc.is_published =1
and (
(wu.id=#{id} and m.is_public = 0 and wu.progress =3 and cc.is_material_entry=1 and m.is_deleted=0)or
(m.is_public = 1 and cc.is_material_entry=1 and m.is_deleted=0) or cc.is_material_entry = 0 ) group by cc.id )t ORDER BY t.sortByEntryBtnOn desc ,t.declaration_id asc, t.auth_date DESC ,t.deadline desc limit 0,3

select n.* from (select t.* from cms_content t left join material b on t.material_id =b.id where t.category_id=3 and t.material_id is not null and t.is_published=1 and t.material_id >0 and b.is_public = 1 and t.auth_status=2 and t.is_deleted=0 and t.apporpc!=2 union select t.* from cms_content t left join material b on t.material_id =b.id left join material_org u on b.id=u.material_id left join writer_user p on p.org_id=u.org_id where t.category_id=3 and t.material_id is not null and t.is_published=1 and t.material_id >0 and b.is_public = 0 and t.auth_status=2 and t.apporpc!=2 and t.is_deleted=0 and p.id= #{id}) n order by n.sort asc limit 0,3
select * from cms_content where category_id='2' and auth_status='2' and is_deleted='0' and apporpc!=2 order by gmt_create desc limit 0,5

SELECT t.type_name, b.* FROM book AS b INNER JOIN material_type t ON t.id = b.type
and ( SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast(#{type} as decimal(9,2))) ),'-',-1) = #{type} or t.id = #{type} ) where b.is_on_sale = 1 order by b.is_stick*b.sort desc, b.image_url desc
limit ${startrows},14

select count(*) from ( SELECT t.type_name, b.id FROM book AS b INNER JOIN material_type t ON t.id = b.type and ( SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast(#{type} as decimal(9,2))) ),'-',-1) = #{type} or t.id = #{type} ) where b.is_on_sale = 1) as cc

select cc.*,wu.avatar,wu.id as userId, case when cc.author_type =1 then pu.realname when cc.author_type =2 then wu.realname else '系统' end as realname, case when cc.author_type =1 then pu.avatar when cc.author_type =2 then wu.avatar else 'DEFAULT' end as avatar, cc.author_name, cc.author_id from cms_content cc left join pmph_user pu on pu.id=cc.author_id left join writer_user wu on wu.id=cc.author_id left join cms_category ccy on cc.category_id= ccy.id where ccy.category_name='医学随笔' and cc.is_deleted=0 and cc.auth_status=2 and cc.is_published=1
order by cc.`auth_date` desc limit 0,#{endrow}
SELECT max(b.type) type,t.note FROM book b join material_type t on b.type=t.id where t.path like #{typepath} GROUP BY t.note ORDER BY sum(b.clicks) desc,LENGTH(t.note) LIMIT 0,10

select u.* ,f.request_id = u.id and f.target_id = #{logUserId} and f.status = 0 as isBeenRequest ,f.target_id = u.id and f.request_id = #{logUserId} and f.status = 0 as hasRequest ,f.status from writer_user u left join writer_friend f on ((f.request_id = u.id and f.target_id = #{logUserId} ) or (f.target_id = u.id and f.request_id =#{logUserId})) where u.is_top = 1 order by top_sort desc limit 0,4

SELECT u.id, b.id id1, b.bookname, b.image_url, c.content, c.score, u.nickname FROM book AS b INNER JOIN (SELECT * from book_user_comment where is_auth = 1 AND is_hide = 0 AND is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY book_id )AS c ON b.id = c.book_id INNER JOIN writer_user AS u ON c.writer_id = u.id ORDER BY b.comments DESC limit 0,4

SELECT t.type_name, b.* FROM book AS b inner JOIN material_type AS t ON b.type = t.id and SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast(#{type} as decimal(9,2))) ),'-',-1) = #{type} where b.is_on_sale = 1 ORDER BY b.sales DESC limit 0,6

select m.* from material_type m inner join ( select concat(m.path,'-',m.id,'-') full_path from material_type m inner join book b on b.type = m.id and b.is_on_sale =1 group by m.id )p on p.full_path REGEXP concat('^.*-',m.id,'-.*') where m.parent_id=#{parent_id} group by m.id order by m.sort
select * from cms_advertisement where adname=#{adName} and is_disabled='0'
select i.* from cms_advertisement_image i join cms_advertisement a on i.advert_id=a.id where a.adname=#{adName} and a.is_disabled='0' and i.is_disabled='0' order by i.id

SELECT count(*) FROM book AS b INNER JOIN material_type t ON t.id = b.type
and ( SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast(#{type} as decimal(9,2))) ),'-',-1) = #{type} or t.id = #{type} )

SELECT count(s.id) FROM survey_target st inner join survey s on s.id = st.survey_id inner join writer_user wu ON wu.org_id = st.org_id WHERE now() >= s.`begin_date` AND now() <= DATE_ADD(s.`end_date`, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND s.`status` = 1 AND s.is_deleted = 0 and wu.id = #{logUserId}

SELECT count(1) a, 'notice' type FROM user_message u WHERE u.receiver_id = #{id} AND u.receiver_type = '2' AND msg_type IN (0, 1) AND u.is_deleted = 0 AND u.is_read = '0' and u.is_withdraw = 0 UNION SELECT count(1) a, 'message' type FROM user_message u WHERE u.receiver_id = #{id} AND u.receiver_type = '2' AND msg_type IN (2) AND u.is_deleted = 0 AND u.is_read = '0' and u.is_withdraw = 0 UNION SELECT count(1) a, 'apply' type FROM writer_friend a WHERE a.target_id = #{id} AND STATUS = 0

SELECT buc.*, buc.is_promote*1 as ispromote, b.bookname, wu.username, wu.nickname, wu.avatar, b.image_url, IFNULL(buc.title, b.bookname) AS hottitle FROM book_user_comment buc LEFT JOIN writer_user wu ON buc.writer_id = wu.id LEFT JOIN book b ON buc.book_id = b.id WHERE buc.is_hide = 0 AND buc.is_deleted = 0 AND buc.is_auth = 1 ORDER BY buc.sort_promote, buc.score DESC limit #{startnum},#{size}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT buc.*, b.bookname, wu.username, wu.avatar, b.image_url, IFNULL(buc.title, b.bookname) AS hottitle FROM book_user_comment buc LEFT JOIN writer_user wu ON buc.writer_id = wu.id LEFT JOIN book b ON buc.book_id = b.id WHERE buc.is_hide = 0 AND buc.is_deleted = 0 AND buc.is_auth = 1 ) t
